title: Understanding the Total Row
text: A total row is a feature in data tables that helps summarize data. It can perform various operations like summing, averaging, or counting the data in each column.

title: Functions of a Total Row
text: The total row can perform different functions depending on the data type in the column. For numerical data, it often sums up the values.

hintAnswer: sums up the information in each column
title: Identifying the Correct Function
text: Which of the following is a primary function of a total row in a data table?
choices: sums up the information in each column
adds the complete row to the table
allows you to make changes in rows
